column3:
おぉ またお会いしましたね
調子はいかがですか？
ところで私が馬宿で奏でている曲
この曲の由来は諸説あるのですが……
私の師匠によると この曲は古の勇者が
愛馬を呼ぶ時に奏でた曲だそうですよ
また聴きたくなったら ぜひ来てくださいね
それでは いつものヤツを……
column4:
Ah, we meet yet again!
How are you holding up?

In case you were wondering about the
song I perform at the stables, there are
many theories about its origin.
But according to my teacher, it was a
song performed by the ancient hero
to call to his horse companion.
If you ever feel like hearing it, feel free
to drop by.

Anyway, time to get back to it...
